package.name: Built-In Preference Packs beta
package.description: Beta versions of the preference Packs included with the FreeCAD distribution

preferencepack.name: Classic theme beta
preferencepack.description: Removes stylesheets, and applies the classic purple/gray background. Resets all colors to default

preferencepack.name: Dark theme beta
preferencepack.description: Applies a dark background and a darker stylesheet, you can choose other stylesheets as you wish.

preferencepack.name: Light theme beta
preferencepack.description: Applies a light background and a light stylesheet, you can choose other stylesheets as you wish.
